paragraph.run: HAVE YOU EVER FELT DEPRESSED?

Volunteers needed needed for a study on link between how the brain and body respond to first impressions and vulnerability to depression. Earn up to $135 for completing surveys, interviews, social interactions during an MRI scan, providing six blood samples (2 tablespoons 6 times), and saliva samples. For more info, contact Katarina Dedovic at study.firstimpressions@gmail.com

UCLA RESEARCHERS LOOKING FOR healthy right-handed subjects, ages 18-50, to participate in study investigating brain's response to immune system changes. Eligible subjects will first come to the lab for 1 hour and then come to the second 8-hour session on a different day. Study involves the injection of placebo or endotoxin (which increases immune system activity in a safe manner), blood draws, and brain scan. Subjects who complete the study will be paid $220. If interested please email
endotoxinstudy@gmail.com or call (310) 825-0658.
$$ SPERM DONORS WANTED $$
Earn up to $1,200/month. Give the gift of family through California Cryobank’s donor program. Convenient Westwood Location. Apply online:SPERMBANK.com
WESTWOOD MEDICAL DOCTOR seeking student with good English skills to review medical records; prepare reports. hours flexible, pay negotiable. email med2u@aol.com

paragraph.run: SALLIES SPANISH CAMP
Six week session of Spanish immersion classes. Ages 5-14yrs old.
*Classes will solely be in Spanish.
*Classes will be divided by level and fluency.
*Children will learn art, music, poetry, games and spanish literature.
Call for more information 310-927-1358.

paragraph.run: TUTORING OFFERED
(in home). Chemistry, Biology, Basic Math, Algebra I, Geometry, Algebra II, Trigonometry, Pre-Calculus, Calculus, SAT Math and study skills. Experienced and professional. Steve 818-517-0566.
BARNEY'S BEANERY
is seeking people who take pride in their work! Open Interviews are held weekly (Mon/Tues/Wed 2pm-3pm) for all positions/locations at 8447 Santa Monica Blvd 90069.

paragraph.style: font-weight: bold; font-size: 12.0pt; text-align: center; font-family: helvetica
paragraph.run: FEMALE TUTOR.
Begin in August. College/Recent Grad for 8th grade girl. 2-3 times/week. 1hr each. Mostly Math and Science. Experience and flexible schedule requred. $20-30/hr. Send resume to pearl.nancy@gmail.com

BABYSITTER/TUTOR. West LA family (near UCLA) seeks warm, good-humored person to assist with care of 3 children ages 10-16. Must be non-smoker; speak perfect English and be confident helping children with school work as required, including math; highly organized, punctual, and reliable; comfortable with a dog; own dependable car and have good driving record; willing to submit to background check. Strength in any of the following a plus: Math/Sciences, Writing, Foreign Languages (Spanish, Latin), Computers, Arts, Music (piano, guitar), Sports (soccer, volleyball, basketball), Cooking. Hours: Mon-Fri, 3-7 pm (though can be flexible one/two days/wk). Salary commensurate w/experience (range $15-20/hr). Send resume/cover letter/written refs/available start date to qhbird@gmail.com
DRIVER/SITTER Wanted: Drive two kids to camp, homework help. Close to UCLA. $18/hr. Must have car and safe driving record. sallyazad@gmail.com
ANNOUNCERS, no experience necessary. Host music/talk-shows for our radio stations. P/T. $10-15/hr, $200+per/show, plus fantastic benefits. 323-468-0080, 24-hours.

ASSISTANT FOR DOCTOR: Housework/home-office. Kitchenwork, cleaning/paperwork, etc. No skills required. Great pay! Flexible schedule, afternoons/evenings/weekends. Leave clear message slowly 424-253-6468.

HIRING WEB ASSISTANT. UCLA Anderson School - International Programs. $11/hr, 15-19hrs/wk. Assistant will provide web & class support to international programs office. Must be available Fridays, Saturdays, some evenings and during intercesssions. Email resume and cover letter to patty.johnson@anderson.ucla.edu.

HOUSEHOLD HELP. WLA. $15-20/hr. 2-4 hours/week. Cleaning, Laundry, household chores, lifting heavy boxes/water. Non-smoker, fluent in English, lift 25+lbs, must have car, computer helpful. Lynn 310-820-7838

JUNIOR AD DESIGNER to design ads for fast growing motion picture and television magazine. P/T hours flexible. Knowledge of InDesign. People person and team player. $10/hr. Contact Janice 310-471-2287.

PART-TIME HELPER. Athletic males/females to assist elderly gentleman. Must be strong, help up/down stairs. Flexible hrs. Patient, compassionate. $11/hr. Email/call Barbara bercubevhills@aol.com, 310-271-7442.
RECEPTIONIST/SECRETARY
Westside law firm. Mon.- Fri. from 8:30 a.m. to 5:30 p.m. Ability to type from dictation. Email resume to joycparker@yahoo.com with title law office receptionist.
SALES AND SUPPORT ASSISTANT NEEDED
P/T 30-40hrs/wk. $12.00/Hr +Commission and travel benefits. call Phil at US1Travel 310-582-0099
SUMMER

PAID Internship. Internet Marketing/Blogging/Journalism for AlconLighting.com. Email your resume and interest in the position to david@alconlighting.com. The right candidate will be allowed to write from home.
$1235+ 1BDRM BEVERLY HILLS ADJ. 2bdrms $1525+, 3bdrms $1995+. Some w/hardwood floor. 1/2-block to shops, blue-busline. No pets. Short-lease possible.
$1735 & UP. 2BDRM/2BATH Westwood. Charming. Tile entry, tiled kitchen. South of Wilshire. No pets. 310-839-6294.
BLOCK TO CAMPUS.
Must See! Huge single ideal for two $1300. Call 310-692-4966.
1&2BEDROOMS WESTWOOD VILLAGE: MIDVALE, NORTH OF LEVERING. Large Bright, views, gardens. Large kitchen, separate dining-room. Large apartments, private entrance. 310-839-6294.

WESTWOOD Grand Opening! LA's finest most luxurious apt rental. Every extra luxury. Custom cabinets, granite countertops, stone entry, pool, health club, spa. Low move-in. 1350 S. Midvale Ave. Los Angeles. Available 2+2, 1+1. 310-864-0319.

1 & 2 bdms. Granite, wood/tile floors, stove/frig/DW, controlled access & parking, laundry on-site. 519 Glenrock Ave. 310-208-4835.
WALK TO UCLA. Lovely 2bdrm/1bath $2100. 1bdrm/1bath Kelton $1450. Hardwood floors, refrigerator, stove, 1parking, laundry in-building. Available Sept. 1. 310-824-2112.
FULLY FURNISHED

including appliances flat-screen tv/cable, linens, cooking utensils. Separate phone line. Separate entrance with parking on gated property for one car. LR, DR and kitchen area. Separate Bedroom, king size bed with adjoining bathroom. Study area. Walk-in closet space. Comfortable, quiet, light. Non-smoker, no pets. Pool available. Car necessary. Utilities and light maid service included in basic rent of $1475/month with DSL and monthly phone additional. Suitable for ONE medical resident or fellow. 1-year lease. 8 minutes from UCLA hospital in Bel-Air. Contact drannekl@aol.com. 310-472-4346.
